philosophies.title: Speed First, Line Second
philosophies.content: Following Dr. Craig Farnsworth's research: proper speed makes more putts than perfect line.

philosophies.title: Deliberate Practice
philosophies.content: Based on Anders Ericsson's expertise research. Quality repetitions with immediate feedback accelerate improvement.

philosophies.title: Pressure Inoculation
philosophies.content: Combine mode creates competitive pressure, following Dr. Bob Rotella's mental game principles.

programs.title: 30-Day Foundation
programs.description: Build consistent speed control with graduated distance progressions. Based on Cameron McCormick's coaching methodology.

programs.title: Strokes Gained Intensive
programs.description: 6-week program targeting specific distance zones. Reduce three-putts by focusing on lag putting excellence.
